title: Dependency graph models
description: Data models for dependency discovery and graph traversal. DependencyType enum (SERVICE, DATASTORE, QUEUE, EXTERNAL, INFRASTRUCTURE), DiscoveredDependency, ResolvedDependency, DependencyGraph with upstream/downstream traversal, BlastRadiusResult for deployment risk assessment. Files: src/nthlayer/dependencies/models.py. Tests: tests/test_deps_discovery.py (21 tests).
